languages.text: "Нет. Так не честно. Это мое спасение? Вы хотите сказать, что я выбралась из чертовой Комморры только чтобы, в итоге, снова надеть на себя эту штуку добровольно?" {n}Псайкер растерянно переводит взгляд то на вас, то на ксеноса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Так не честно. Это мое спасение? Вы хотите сказать, что я выбралась из чертовой Комморры только чтобы, в итоге, снова надеть на себя эту штуку добровольно?" {n}Псайкер растерянно переводит взгляд то на вас, то на ксеноса.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет. Так не честно. Это мое спасение? Вы хотите сказать, что я выбралась из чертовой Комморры только чтобы, в итоге, снова надеть на себя эту штуку добровольно?" {n}Псайкер растерянно переводит взгляд то на вас, то на ксеноса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I got out of the damned Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I got out of the damned Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “不，这不公平。这就是我的救赎吗？这是在告诉我，我之所以从该死的科摩罗逃回来，就是为了心甘情愿地把这东西再戴回头上吗？”{n}伊迪拉一脸沮丧，目光在你和艾达灵族之间不断跳跃。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不，这不公平。这就是我的救赎吗？这是在告诉我，我之所以从该死的科摩罗逃回来，就是为了心甘情愿地把这东西再戴回头上吗？”{n}伊迪拉一脸沮丧，目光在你和艾达灵族之间不断跳跃。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No. No es justo. ¿Esta era mi salvación? ¿Me está diciendo que escapé de la maldita Commorragh solo para poder ponerme esa monstruosidad en la cabeza?». {n}Pasa la mirada del xenos a ti, abatida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No. No es justo. ¿Esta era mi salvación? ¿Me está diciendo que escapé de la maldita Commorragh solo para poder ponerme esa monstruosidad en la cabeza?». {n}Pasa la mirada del xenos a ti, abatida.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Es ist nicht gerecht. Ist das meine Erlösung? Sagt Ihr mir, dass ich aus dem verfluchten Commorragh entkommen bin, nur um mir dieses Ding freiwillig wieder auf den Kopf zu setzen?" {n}Verzweifelt blickt sie zwischen dir und dem Xenos hin und her.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Es ist nicht gerecht. Ist das meine Erlösung? Sagt Ihr mir, dass ich aus dem verfluchten Commorragh entkommen bin, nur um mir dieses Ding freiwillig wieder auf den Kopf zu setzen?" {n}Verzweifelt blickt sie zwischen dir und dem Xenos hin und her.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「嘘。こんなのずるいわ。これがあたいの救いだというの？あの血にまみれたコモラフから逃げてきたのは、そんなものを進んで自分の頭に乗せるだめだったって言うの？」{n}狼狽しながらも、彼女はあなたと異種族を交互に見やっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「嘘。こんなのずるいわ。これがあたいの救いだというの？あの血にまみれたコモラフから逃げてきたのは、そんなものを進んで自分の頭に乗せるだめだったって言うの？」{n}狼狽しながらも、彼女はあなたと異種族を交互に見やっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Non, c'est injuste. Est-ce là mon salut ? Seriez-vous en train de me dire que j'ai échappé à Commorragh pour remettre cette chose sur ma tête de mon plein gré ? » {n}Désemparée, son regard ne cesse d'aller du xénos à vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non, c'est injuste. Est-ce là mon salut ? Seriez-vous en train de me dire que j'ai échappé à Commorragh pour remettre cette chose sur ma tête de mon plein gré ? » {n}Désemparée, son regard ne cesse d'aller du xénos à vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır. Bu, adil değil. Benim selametim bu mu? Kanlı Commorragh'tan o iğrenç şeyi kafama kendi isteğimle koymak için kaçtığımı mı söylüyorsun?" {n}Sana ve zenoya endişeyle bakıp duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. It's not fair. Is this my salvation? Are you telling me I escaped bloody Commorragh just to put that thing back on my head willingly?" {n}Dismayed, she keeps looking between you and the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Bu, adil değil. Benim selametim bu mu? Kanlı Commorragh'tan o iğrenç şeyi kafama kendi isteğimle koymak için mi kaçtığımı söylüyorsun?" {n}Sana ve zenoya endişeyle bakıp duruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
